content: In FY2014, the Department of Defense (DOD) obligated over $280 billion for federal contracts, surpassing all other federal agencies combined. Improved data analysis could potentially lead to more effective decision-making, prompting Congress to consider increasing oversight and enabling DOD to conduct better operations.
